message: Hello Bob, I'm willing to sell my product to you right now for $14500.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14500 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to buy the product for $6000.
Hi Bob, I've reconsidered and I'm willing to sell the product for $12000. This is a great deal for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the discount, but $12000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your current offer. I can buy the product for $9000.
